panels.description: The number of commits from different commit authors.

targets.rawSql:
with commit_data as(
  SELECT
    DATE_ADD(date(authored_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(authored_date))+1 DAY)  as time,
    c.author_name,
    count(*) as commit_count
  FROM commits c
  WHERE
    c.message not like '%Merge%'
    and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  group by 2,1
  order by 2,1
),

this_month as(
  select 
		DATE_ADD(date(CURDATE()), INTERVAL -DAY(date(CURDATE()))+1 DAY) as this_month
),

last_month as(
	select 
		DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(date(CURDATE()), INTERVAL -DAY(date(CURDATE()))+1 DAY), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) as last_month
),

the_month_before_last as(
	SELECT 
		DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(date(CURDATE()), INTERVAL -DAY(date(CURDATE()))+1 DAY), INTERVAL -2 MONTH) as the_month_before_last
),

this_month_record as(
	SELECT
		author_name,
		commit_count as this_month_count,
		time as this_month
	from commit_data
	WHERE 
		time in (SELECT this_month from this_month)
),

last_month_record as(
	SELECT
		author_name,
		commit_count as last_month_count,
		time as last_month
	from commit_data
	WHERE 
		time in (SELECT last_month from last_month)
),
the_month_before_last_record as(
	SELECT
		author_name,
		commit_count as the_month_before_last_count,
		time as the_month_before_last
	from commit_data
	WHERE 
		time in (SELECT the_month_before_last from the_month_before_last)
)

SELECT
	COALESCE(NULLIF(tmr.author_name,''), NULLIF(lmr.author_name,''), tmblr.author_name) AS 'Author Name',
	COALESCE(tmblr.the_month_before_last_count,0) AS "The Month before Last",
	COALESCE(lmr.last_month_count,0) AS "Last Month",
	COALESCE(tmr.this_month_count,0) AS "This Month"
FROM this_month_record tmr 
right join last_month_record lmr on tmr.author_name = lmr.author_name 
right join the_month_before_last_record tmblr on lmr.author_name = tmblr.author_name
UNION
SELECT
	COALESCE(NULLIF(tmr.author_name,''), NULLIF(lmr.author_name,''), tmblr.author_name) AS 'Author Name',
	COALESCE(tmblr.the_month_before_last_count,0) AS "The Month before Last",
	COALESCE(lmr.last_month_count,0) AS "Last Month",
	COALESCE(tmr.this_month_count,0) AS "This Month"
FROM this_month_record tmr 
left join last_month_record lmr on tmr.author_name = lmr.author_name 
left join the_month_before_last_record tmblr on lmr.author_name = tmblr.author_name
order by 2 desc
limit 20

panels.title: Commit Count by Author [Top 20]

targets.rawSql:
with commit_data as(
  SELECT
    DATE_ADD(date(authored_date), INTERVAL -DAY(date(authored_date))+1 DAY)  as time,
    c.author_name,
    count(*) as commit_count
  FROM commits c
  WHERE
    c.message not like '%Merge%'
    and $__timeFilter(authored_date)
  group by 2,1
  order by 2,1
),

this_month as(
  select 
		DATE_ADD(date(CURDATE()), INTERVAL -DAY(date(CURDATE()))+1 DAY) as this_month
),

last_month as(
	select 
		DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(date(CURDATE()), INTERVAL -DAY(date(CURDATE()))+1 DAY), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) as last_month
),

the_month_before_last as(
	SELECT 
		DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(date(CURDATE()), INTERVAL -DAY(date(CURDATE()))+1 DAY), INTERVAL -2 MONTH) as the_month_before_last
),

this_month_record as(
	SELECT
		author_name,
		commit_count as this_month_count,
		time as this_month
	from commit_data
	WHERE 
		time in (SELECT this_month from this_month)
),

last_month_record as(
	SELECT
		author_name,
		commit_count as last_month_count,
		time as last_month
	from commit_data
	WHERE 
		time in (SELECT last_month from last_month)
),
the_month_before_last_record as(
	SELECT
		author_name,
		commit_count as the_month_before_last_count,
		time as the_month_before_last
	from commit_data
	WHERE 
		time in (SELECT the_month_before_last from the_month_before_last)
)


SELECT
  COALESCE(NULLIF(tmr.author_name,''), NULLIF(lmr.author_name,''), tmblr.author_name) AS 'Author Name',
	COALESCE(tmblr.the_month_before_last_count,0) AS "The Month before Last",
	COALESCE(lmr.last_month_count,0) AS "Last Month",
	COALESCE(tmr.this_month_count,0) AS "This Month",
	case 
	  when lmr.last_month_count is null or tmr.this_month_count is null then '-'
	  else concat(FORMAT(100 * (tmr.this_month_count - lmr.last_month_count)/lmr.last_month_count,1),'%') end as "Changes in last 2 month"
FROM this_month_record tmr 
right join last_month_record lmr on tmr.author_name = lmr.author_name 
right join the_month_before_last_record tmblr on lmr.author_name = tmblr.author_name
union
SELECT
  COALESCE(NULLIF(tmr.author_name,''), NULLIF(lmr.author_name,''), tmblr.author_name) AS 'Author Name',
	COALESCE(tmblr.the_month_before_last_count,0) AS "The Month before Last",
	COALESCE(lmr.last_month_count,0) AS "Last Month",
	COALESCE(tmr.this_month_count,0) AS "This Month",
	case 
	  when lmr.last_month_count is null or tmr.this_month_count is null then '-'
	  else concat(FORMAT(100 * (tmr.this_month_count - lmr.last_month_count)/lmr.last_month_count,1),'%') end as "Changes in last 2 month"
FROM this_month_record tmr 
left join last_month_record lmr on tmr.author_name = lmr.author_name 
left join the_month_before_last_record tmblr on lmr.author_name = tmblr.author_name
order by 4 desc
